phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
phoneNumber.note: This phone number will be configured as your voice inbound and outbound number by this setup script.

smsNumber.title: SMS Number
smsNumber.note: This SMS number provides a bridge from SMS to Twilio IP Chat and vice versa.

facebook.title: Facebook Page ID (optional)
facebook.note: Please enable Facebook Messaging in your Twilio account and forward messages to
